mapper.sql: person.id as person_id, person.name as person_name, person.classify as person_classify, person.type as person_type, person.org_id as person_org_id, person.mobile1 as person_mobile1, person.mobile2 as person_mobile2, person.add_time as person_add_time, person.add_person as person_add_person, person.status as person_status, person.username as person_username, person.password as person_password, person.shield_state as person_shield_state, person.remark as person_remark, person.del as person_del, person.create_time as person_create_time, person.create_user as person_create_user, person.update_time as person_update_time, person.update_user as person_update_user
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from person person
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into person (name, classify, type, org_id, mobile1, mobile2, add_time, add_person, status, username, password, shield_state, remark, del, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user ) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classify,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mobile1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{addPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shieldState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{del,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
